citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
It has been more than 12 months since the licensee's last site visit from their attending veterinarian. The Licensee's
program of veterinary care prescribes that site visits shall occur "every 12 months".
Failing to schedule regular site visits in accordance with your program of veterinary care prevents prompt identification of
any health, husbandry or facility concerns the attending veterinarian may have.
The facility called their attending veterinarian to schedule their site visit at the time of inspection. Correct from this day
forward (August 6, 2025) by ensuring regularly scheduled visits to the premises as directed by your program of veterinary
care.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
It has been more than 12 months since the licensee's last site visit from their attending veterinarian. The Licensee's 
program of veterinary care prescribes that site visits shall occur "every 12 months".  
 
Failing to schedule regular site visits in accordance with your program of veterinary care prevents prompt identification of 
any health, husbandry or facility concerns the attending veterinarian may have.  
 
The facility called their attending veterinarian to schedule their site visit at the time of inspection. Correct from this day 
forward (August 6, 2025) by ensuring regularly scheduled visits to the premises as directed by your program of veterinary 
care. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n

species.common: CONGO AFRICAN GREY PARROT / GRAY PARROT
